alert.note: Alert for Garland; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 8:02PM CDT until May 19 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Garland County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Saline County in central Arkansas... West central Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 802 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jessieville, or near Hot Springs Village, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hot Springs Village... Avilla... Paron... Grape... Bland... Reform... Ferndale... Congo... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
